item.description:
Hello Everyone,

This is a lovely race that a few of us did back in 2008...it's on a Tuesday night so you'll have to skip out of work early that afternoon :)

http://www.yankeerace...

Here's all the blurb from the website...

Imagine a beautiful summer evening in the beautiful town of Newburyport, MA. Each year, hundreds of runners in both the 10M and 5K enjoy a breathtaking course through the bucolic seaside town, running along the ocean for several miles before winding through a state park and charming New England neighborhoods. The Yankee Homecoming 10M and 5K are truly picture perfect.

So it has been for decades. And the tradition continues in 2010 as we celebrate the 50th year of the Yankee Homecoming Race.

If you sign up then please mark a yes on here and also whether you're willing to carpool etc.

Thank you... Martin

p.s. you're responsible for your own registration, safety etc. etc.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll work it out nearer the time...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organized Race - The Yankee Homecoming 10 miler
